definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: The diamond is of the highest color grading for a white diamond and clarity ranking.
sentences.chinese: 这颗钻石具有白钻石最高的颜色评级和净度。

sentences.english: DGCA category I rating earned in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 民航总局第一类在2007年获得评级。

sentences.english: Analyst from the second largest international assessing agency Moody said.
sentences.chinese: 国际第二大评级机构穆迪的分析师对本报记者表示。

sentences.english: In this regard, Xinhua Finance Department issued a short commentary credit rating a dissenting opinion.
sentences.chinese: 对此，新华财经资信评级部门发表短评提出不同意见。

sentences.english: there are three ready agencies you have to use.
sentences.chinese: 评级公司中有三个政府指定机构。

sentences.english: Internal Ratings-Based (IRB) approach is the core of the New Basel Accord.
sentences.chinese: 内部评级法是巴塞尔新资本协议的核心。

sentences.english: We have also removed both the short- and long-term ratings from CreditWatch negative.
sentences.chinese: 我们也将短期与长期评级从信用观察负面中移除。

sentences.english: The very fact that ratings can be reduced undermines the basic premise of reliability.
sentences.chinese: 基于破坏可靠真实这一基本前提，评级确实在被弱化。

sentences.english: Credit rating agencies are also keeping an eye on Toyota's brand image.
sentences.chinese: 信用评级机构也在密切关注丰田的品牌形象。

sentences.english: The level of BNP was the important indicatrix of the CHF diagnose and therapeutic effect.
sentences.chinese: BNP水平是心力衰竭诊断及评级疗效的重要指标。

sentences.english: Lower risks should lead to the re-rating of risk assets like property or stock.
sentences.chinese: 降低风险的评级，要像财产或股票的风险资产。

sentences.english: The Swiss hearing-aid maker was cut to “neutral” from “buy” at UBS AG.
sentences.chinese: 瑞银集团把该公司股票评级从买入下调为中性。

sentences.english: When Shelly says he's the harshest grader on campus, he isn't lying.
sentences.chinese: 当薛立说他是全校评级最严苛的老师时，他没有撒谎。

sentences.english: A ratings module can extend any node to include grades.
sentences.chinese: 一个评级模块能扩展任意节点，使之包含等级。

sentences.english: S&P in particular has cited $4 trillion in debt reduction as a figure that would be appropriate for keeping the triple-A rating.
sentences.chinese: 标普特别提到，维持AAA评级需要减债4万亿美元。

sentences.english: Netflix was raised to “buy” from “underperform” at Bank of America Corp.
sentences.chinese: 美国银行把奈飞公司股票评级从减持上调为买入。

definition: Dagong Global Credit Rating, credit rating agency based in China
Moody's, company specializing in financial market ratings
Standard and Poor's (S&P), company specializing in financial market ratings/S&P financial index
to underwrite (i.e. guarantee financing)/underwriting/to sell as agent/consignee
to regard as having good prospects
the Stars and Stripes (US flag)/by extension, the United States of America/abbr. for Citibank 花旗銀行|花旗银行
